project.name: vinyl-laravel
project.description: Laravel 11 vinyl record collection app with Livewire 3.7, Tailwind CSS, Discogs API integration

routes./export/artist: Export artist data to XLS (auth required)
routes./create/vinyl: CreateVinyl - create new vinyl record (auth required)

livewire_components: VinylTable - main vinyl listing with search/pagination

database_tables.artists: Artist data with Discogs integration (discogs_id, discogs_url, discogs_image_url, discogs_id_manual, discogs_fetch_attempted)
database_tables.records: Vinyl records linked to artists (artist_id FK, discogs_record_id, record_name)

artisan_commands.discogs:populate: Fetch Discogs data for artists (1.5s rate limit)
artisan_commands.discogs:refresh-manual: Refresh artists with manual Discogs IDs

features.discogs_integration: Fetches artist metadata/images from Discogs API with manual ID override support
features.redis_caching: Cache::rememberForever() pattern for page data, requires manual cache clear on data changes
features.search: Cross-table search: artist names OR record titles via Artist::scopeSearch()
features.ntfy_notifications: Push notifications on XLS export with timestamp/IP logging
features.auth: HTTP Basic Auth with Redis sessions (120min lifetime)
features.excel_export: Download vinyl collection as XLS with Ntfy webhook

dev_commands.composer dev: Start dev env (serve + queue + npm dev concurrently)
